content.detailedDescription: The first time i saw the ufo was on april 21 around 5 in the evening i was standing on my back porch and saw just a little over my neighbors roof was a grey disk thing very thin just hovering but it was tilted not straight so i ran inside grabbed my camera and got a picture of it but i was in a hurry so i didn't focus the photo on it i felt if i didn't hurry it would leave and soon as i took the picture it completely vanished and i didn't hear anything or see it move in a blink of an eye literally it was gone but then two days i went outside again this time with my camera ready it was around 12 noon but it was very quite and clear out and everything was peaceful i really don't know why i just felt urged to go out again then out of no where my dog started running in a circle around me which scared the crap out of me she never does this and then almost at the same tine her and the two neighbor dogs started barking and i could hear them running around the fence and then i just felt like a tug on my neck to look up so i did i wasn't even thinking tell i saw it. it was a white orb completely silent flying right above me i had to look straight up and strain my neck little to see it and i snapped one picture zoomed in as far as i could and it looked more long in the picture then with my eye then i switched my camera to video mode and started filming while the dogs were still barking and running around my camera cant zoom as good in video mode but i got a few good seconds of it before, like the first, it disappeared completely and just like dissolved in the sky and i could see it all and it was silent when it left so it seriously just dissappered but ever since the first sighting i have been sick at my stomach horrible it feels like nausea and the feeling i ate to much but it happens when i don't even eat it just comes in waves all day tell and around 6 at night everyday since it just stays in pain tell around 12 at night i cant explain the reason why but it started the night i saw the first disk
content.summary: First one a grey disk second a white oval or orb

content.detailedDescription:
#1 it was a beautiful spring morning in oklahoma on the 6th of april 2010. i went outside to take a picture of the backyard at 10:48. there was a glare on the screen of the camera so it was hard to see the image. 
#2 i didn't notice the object behind the tree limbs until i transferred it on the computer. 
#3 i knew it wasn't a tree limb, a bird, plane, or cloud. i can't identify it, it's an object in the sky flying. that makes it a ufo.
content.summary: I didn't notice it until i put it in my pictures on the computer.

content.detailedDescription:
Was heading home as there was no work that morning. approximately 1-1/2 miles from home i noticed that the chem trails were very thick. i drove on to my home and grabbed my digital camera. it is a sony mavica cd 1000. as i headed back towards the top of the hill, i started shooting the trails. not one of these objects were visible by eye or through the camera eye piece at the time of the shots. i sat for about four hours that day logging shots for evidence. one of the most unusual of the shots was the appearance of what i believe to be an alien form not more than 20 feet away from where i was standing during one of the shots. also to the extreme right in the picture is what i assume to be a transport module of some sort. i have never seen anything even remotely close to this entity or form in the picture in all of my years of researching ufo's and alien beings. all of these shots were within 1/2 mile of each other and no farther in distance to my residence at the time. if anyone has any information, ideas, or similar photos i would greatly appreciate your contact. i am quite serious about this subject and am in no way shape or form falsifying or altering any faction of my experiance.
      i feel as though there is something to this that i am missing. i have been back to the sight numerous times trying to promote contact but with no luck so far. i am very badly wanting to see this entity in a solid form rather than its semi transparent form in my picture. there were numerous discs or saucers in the shots taken that day also.
content.summary: Was shooting chem trails and objects were not visible in camera at time of shots

content.detailedDescription: Weird object here in san fernando valley/mission hills area california  im in my apt on the second floor and i keep seeing my window this strange object that is pulsating & just staying in one place for about 30 minutes then moves slowly for a few seconds then sits for another 30 minutes then after a few hours it just vanishes  i've seen it almost every other day since i moved here  in may 2009 heres a link to a video of  it with more coming soon
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: I keep seeing this thing

content.detailedDescription: En la fecha mencionada, ���bamos caminando con un amigo , cuando observamos en el cielo una luz blanca incandescente en forma de diamante suspendida en el cielo, la cual nos llamo mucho la atenci���n, al principio cre���amos que se trataba de una estrella, pero cuando comenz��� a elevarse verticalmente nos dimos cuenta que no era as���, nos quedamos mir���ndola cerca de 5 minutos mientras se mov���a r���pidamente en sentido horizontal, en una sola direcci���n hasta que fue desapareciendo a gran velocidad, luego aparecio otra luz cerca de esta de las mismas caracter���sticas pero sin movimiento, posteriormente se apaga sin dejar rastro.
content.summary: Luz blanca incandesnte suspendida en el aire como estrella gigante

content.detailedDescription: Top left hand corner, there is something in the picture. i zoomed in on it.
content.summary: Followup to black helicopter pic

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my daughter to her fathers house leaving from allentown going towards kutztown.It was 7:40 when we left. we were traveling on shantz rd. near the police station when i just turned my head to look out the window and i saw this large light over the industrial park. what really caught my interest was the color and size.It was this reddish orange light that just pulsated. i was driving so i put my eyes back on the road and i asked my 10 year old daughter if she saw it. she looked over and said yes what is that. she kept and eye on it and realized it was not moving. we then went over the hill towards the winery and we looked back to try to see it again and we couldn't. it was to low to see over the hill. so we just dismissed and went on our way to kutztown. the best way i could describe this was if you could imagine a low flying air plane that was just a ball of puslating light and didn't move. thats how big it was. so i drop my daughter of in kutztown a little after 8 pm and start heading home. i get to where i turn of on 222 to shantz rd. there is a gas station right there. i pass the gas station and just look toward the terri hill water park area of 222. my heart dropped three extremly large lights reddish orange like the size of a full moon all in a perfect triangle shape. the lights spanned maybe the half the size of a football field. i couldn't believe how low and large it was. i thought to myself i need to get a picture of this my husband will never believe me. where i was on shantz rd i couldn't pull over so as soon as i got to the lucent building drive way i pulled over but the building was blocking the lights. i still can't believe what i saw. i called my husband and told him. while i was on the phone with my husband i decided to see if i could see it if i kept going further. i drove up and over the hill turned onto the road to go into the industrial park knowing this is where i saw the other light earlier. i turned onto the road and i saw nothing as if nothing ever happened. there is now way that i was the only one that saw this.
content.summary: It was three very large reddish orange lights in a triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: This just flew over my house 20 minutes ago, no identifiable markings and no other air traffic.
content.summary: Black helicopter

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a full halo prism all day long. i happen to see a shiny silver orb close to the halo  i was looking at. i stopped and watched it to rule out possible things it could be. it was not moving at all and seemed less then a mile or 2 away.  i got in my work truck and was able to drive home which was less then a mile away to get my camera. i took a few shots before i lost sight of it through the tree line.  2hrs later low flying helicopters where around. i have pics of them too. i whitnessed this orb move in every direction in a slow smooth motion.  the pics are not as good as i wish for that i am sorry. my heart was racing i was lucky to be able to get home and get a camera before it decided to move south west.  one image is a zoomed in negative of the orb.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched a silver orb for 15mins

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately june 1996 i was mowing our very large front lawn with fruit trees all about.  my path around a corner apple tree i felt the presence of something. second time around in the same spot i feel a presence again so i am looking around but see nothing.  third time i am coming up to this corner looking at everything in front of me and see nothing but going under and around the tree i feel a presence again, continuing on and looking back, still i see nothing.  ok now i am disturbed, i know i am being watched but i don���t see anything.  it is my fourth pass i am determined to see what is looking at me.  i come up on the corner i feel the presence i pass under the tree and as i look back, up in the apple tree is a small creature being with dark almond shaped eyes, opaque color thin limbs.  it was kind of scrunched up in the tree just watching me, in clear view and just watching me.  when i first seen the being it was invisible, i mean i was looking thru it, i wasn���t grasping what i was seeing. i was scared.  i did not finish mowing the lawn.  i did not tell anyone as i thought certain they think me crazy.   
about a week later around 1:00 am i witnessed a mother ship hovering in the field just outside the bathroom window.  5 acres separated us and our neighbor, i could not see the neighbor���s house it was so big.  it appeared to be hovering just a few feet off the ground, round and disk like in shape with many windows.  it was close enough you could see activity in the port holes of the craft.  i turned away for just a second and the craft was gone, i didn���t see it leave. 
my sense was that the being in the tree was lost or perhaps like a teenager took off and the mother ship was there to pick him/her up.  i have always been of the opinion that we are not alone and well now i know that to be true.  of course you ask the question, why me, why did this being presence it���s self to me?  i sensed the lesson for me was continue on my journey continue on my search for peace.  it was like the being and i had something in common, assuring me that there are struggles no matter who you are or where you are in the universe.
content.summary: Extraterrestrial recovered by mother ship

content.detailedDescription: Was leaving car with wife and looking at stars,, saw a object coming from the south,, thought it might be a satilight, watch for a few sec more then object stop moving stayed for 10 sec,  then saw one coming from north then stop  by the one,then bouth took off south at a high rate of speed
content.summary: Saw star like object come in from south and stop then leave with a another.

content.detailedDescription: A freind and i were traveling on us 221 in check'va going to a freinds house and we topped over a hill we saw a bright light and i just thought it was a plane or helicopter or somethin then as we got closer we realized it wasnt either one when we got to it i realized it was a triangle shaped object floating very very slowly not making any sound and had lights on each point.I pulled into a little store parking lot and got out and stood there watching it amazed by what i was seeing it,it was allmost surreal and my freind was telling me to get in and jet he didnt wanr any part of it but i was kind of mesmorized by it so after like 10 or 15 min i decided it was time to go.On our way back through about 20 to 30 min later there was no sign of it at all.Ive allways wondered what it was no one belived us when we told our store they just laughed and said we were high or something but i know what i saw nad i was dead sober.
content.summary: A triangle shaped object with lights on each point with no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked my kids to the bus stop this morning and took several pictures
along the way. i got home and downloaded them right after and noticed 2 pictures with something odd in the back ground. i zoomed in and noticed
a v shaped ufo and a triangle shaped ufo off in the distance.
i never saw this when i took the pictures.

i think they are very clear and would like to know what you think.

taken at 8 in the morning.

i will send them in order. 1,2,3   the way i took them.
first picture has nothing. just to show you.
content.summary: Did not discover till i downloaded my pictures.

content.detailedDescription: in the spring of 1988, i was walking from the hot-springs fed swimming-pool and daytime resort complex,across the unlit road,to the employee housing complex,probably one-quarter mile southeast, and uphill. after leaving the pavement, i was on the steeper narrow dirt path,and had to hold an arm out to block tall weeds and shrubs. as i walked,i was looking forward and up, and i saw what i first thought was the moon,but it was moving toward the east very slowly. as i stopped and watched the object,i realized it was slowing down. i noticed a very rough surface and saw a very small piece of debris fall away at the same spot from which arose a small blue-white flicker of flame. the object was moving slow enough at this time, that the flame was not influenced by the wind or the forward motion. the object moved from approximately a 7:00 position to a 4:00 position across my field of vision.The object took maybe two to two and one half minutes to cross my field of vision. i was walking south- south- east. after the object passed over the trees and ridges to the east,i stood still, and hoped to hear it hit. i heard nothing . i then hurried the next couple of hundred yards to my apartment, and rushed in to tell my girlfriend about the funny-moving, odd-looking thing i had just seen. she pretty-much just appeared uninterested.I then went back outside to see if anyone else was able to see what i saw.The security guard was just pulling up outside by the side walk. i asked him if he had seen what i had just seen. he said he had and it scared him. i suggested that he should report it to someone. he didn't act like he was in any hurry to tell anyone. i do not ever remember discussing the subject again with him. i asked around and only one other person admitted to me that they had seen the object.The other person was born again religious and simply shrugged it off as a manifestation of god. this incident occurred on (over?) the warm springs indian reservation.The object was easily five times the size of the sun or moon.The object was mostly dark, but was clearly visible, and had small patches of reddish-orange, and other small patches of blueish-white.The small piece of debris that sort of popped out or off was from a blue-white patch.
content.summary: I was one of three witnesses to a rough-surfaced,silent,slow-moving, large, spherical object at approximately 9:30 pm

content.detailedDescription: on wednesday april 20th at about 8:45pm, i was driving south bound on i-5, just south of san clemente when i noticed a slender triangular shaped object above my car. i couldn���������t tell the size of it. it was either really high and very large or really low and not that large.  if i put my arm all the way out it was the slightly larger than my hand.  it had lights pulsating in sequence beginning from the point of the triangle (the front) down to the back and then back up to the front. when it reached the front the lights would pause for a second and then start the rotation over again.  i followed the object for a total of about 10 minutes, and was able to get a pretty good look of it. the lights on it where a light blue in color. the bottom/belly of the object appeared to be rounded. the object appeared to be a midnight blue in color but that could have been a reflection from the flashing blue lights. for about 5 minutes the object was going with traffic while zigzagging left and right over the freeway.  after a little bit, still traveling in a zigzag path, it began to speed up until it traveled out of sight.  at 9 pm my boyfriend called me. while explaining to him what i had seen,  i saw another light.  at that point i was coming up to the agricultural check point on the northbound side of i-5.  at first i thought it was an airplane. when i got closer i realized it wasn���������t moving and it was only about 100 yards above the freeway. it was a solid white light approximately the size of my thumb at arms length just floating about the freeway. as i drove past it i was able to look out the drivers side window and see nothing attached to it. it was just a single bright floating light.
content.summary: I saw a triangle shape abouve the i-5

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin "c" and i were traveling to some local haunted places in the spirit of halloween with a video camera in hand to debunk or record are experience.  while driving to one of the locations we were stopped at a stop sign by a local thrift store which you can see the sign of it in the video.  my cousin was driving and i was the passenger he placed the car in park and we both watched these three yellowish white lights in a triangle shape formation.  they were revolving and then flattened out into a straight line formation and then appeared to get closer to us.  my cousin began taping as we both watched and talked in excitement not knowing what it was.  i just remeber being overly excited trying to focus in on it. as we watched one of the lights in the formation went off on its on path and dissapeared and then as we looked for it just apppeared again seconds later.  it appeared back in the line formation and then all three seemed to get closer again and then came together as they got smaller and began traveling at a high rate of speed in which i took the camera and we got back in my cousins truck and we tried to follow but lost it. video and sound was recorded of the hole experience.  i have sinced witnessed the same lights but did not have a camera to record and it was not of the same magnitude.  

upon someone requesting i would submit the video but i do not have the capablity to transfer the video over to a computer file.  video is on vhs recorder tape.

if anyone else has seen anything like this please let me know or let me know if anyone can debunk and explain this event.  

thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three lights or objects in a revolving formation

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed a bright orange light flying relatively low over las vegas through my living room window.  walked outside my home and looked north to see approximately nine more bright, flickering orange lights moving eastward and apparently ascending at a very fast rate. 

at first, i thought it may have been a helicopter but it was too fast and the bright orange, flickering light is unlike anything i have ever seen flying in the sky.  

the lights appeared to ascend at a fast rate and i believe the flickering lights "went out" as a result of moving away from me.  

i have never experienced a 'ufo' before but it's a strange feeling--this was something technologically advanced.  perhaps from area 51 just north of our city?
content.summary: About ten flickering orange lights

content.detailedDescription: My daughters and i who are 33 and 20 years old now, were coming back from the laundry mat in easthamton massachusetts it must have been about 7 p.M. when  we saw two bright lights raising from the pond we used to live across from the street and we just wonder what could it be, as we got closer i thought it might be a helicopter but then i thought aloud helicopters only have one light, and as we got closer i realize this is not a helicopter. i stop just a few feet before i turned into my dry way and my daughter and i stuck our heads out of the window and this thing was hoovering above us not making a sound but just a (i can't not explain the sound ) but just like a very low hoovering sound above us i could hardly hear it, and all of the suddenly i got this alarming frightening feeling and as i looked out of the window i saw this thing hoovering above my car not quite 30 feet above my car, so i yelled at my daughter to go and get her father, as she runned tours the house i was still looking at this thing hoovering over my car and i got so frightened that i got out of the car and stared running tours my house and then i realize my baby was still in the car so i runned back it must have taken a couple of minutes before i got back to the car i took my baby out of the car and looked up, and all of the sudden this thing it just turn around in mid air without making a sound and flew away it was gone in a matter of seconds if not less. a few years after that, when my youngest daughter learn how to speak and then write all she used to talk about and write about is how she was in a different planet and how she used to tell these people she wanted to go home and be with her family i keep some of the papers she wrote back then
content.summary: The objet was hoovering above us for about 30 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I am not the witness.  i met the witness today while having lunch at ****** bar located at *** ******** ave, gladstone, or, 97027.  his name is *** and he is a regular who appears approximately in his early 60s.

on monday, april 12th, he witnessed a very bright, colorful ufo flying at an altitude of only 300 feet.  he said it was about 90 feet long and make a low humming sound that "you could physically feel."

he first noted it coming from across the willamette (near west linn) heading in a northerly direction.  he said it "shifted" to a ene direction without turning or banking. it moved very slowly.  he said it changed multiple colors but without a distinct light source.

he stated that he flagged down a car and asked the two people in it to confirm what he was looking at.  they concurred then drove off.  he claims he had not been drinking.  ultimately it flew towards clackamas before he lost sight of it.

days later, while visiting his daughter, he described what he saw.  his grand-daughter overheard him and said she saw it too.

i have yet to find any news on this so far.

i hope this is helpful.

i plan to go back to talk with him more.

my contact info is ***-***-****

my name is **** *****

feel free to call, but like i said, i was not a witness to the event.
content.summary: Ufo seen over milwaukie on april 12th.

content.detailedDescription:
My 10 year-old son and i were camping at a remote ranch in northern tamaulipas, mexico. the purpose of our visit to the ranch was archaeological explorations of indian campsites, which i have been exploring regularly since 1982. the ranch is located on the rio grande, about 5 miles northwest of the city of zapata, texas. our campsite is located on a small plateau about 1/2 mile west of the river. i have been a police officer since 1993. my background (field of study) is astronomy and archaeology. 

we arrived at the ranch, the rancho san fabian (ca. 4,500 acres) late in the afternoon of april 16, 1999. we managed to get in about 1 1/2 hrs. of exploration before we had to proceed to our campsite to get set up for the night ahead. we planned to spend the entire next day exploring the myriad archaeological sites on the ranch. this ranch is very remote, and the nearest mexican city is nuevo laredo, some 40-45 miles north. in 1999 there still was no electricity on the ranch. 

my archaeological field notes for the date in question (04/16/99) indicate that my son and i started gathering firewood in the area of the camp, but i left briefly to gather more a short distance from the camp. upon my arrival my son reported a close encounter with a coyote while i was gone. we started a campfire, the only light in this very dark area. the fire was started at about 8:35 p.M. my notes indicate that it was a very pleasant evening, and an owl was heard hooting in the area. 

a few minutes after getting a roaring fire going, i noticed a bright clustering of white lights low in the southwestern skies, a few degrees above the horizon. there is a north to south trending ridge that runs about 1/2 mile west of our campsite, otherwise the view of the sky is uninhibited. the only trees in the immediate vicinity are low, thorny mesquite trees. the cluster of lights were obviously moving, but i was unsure how far away they were. the lights appeared to be getting slowly closer, and they traveled on a course that led them to a point due west of our campsite. 

at one point i realized the lights were getting much brighter, and i suddenly realized they were moving directly towards our position on the 
barren plateau. my first thought was that the lights were from a mexican military helicopter, and they (mexican military officials) had spotted out campfire. however, i strained to hear the sound of helicopter rotors, but no sound was heard. i still believed it was a helicopter, and the object was getting much closer. i expressed concern to my son that the percieved military helicopter might attempt to land at our campsite. he became obviously distressed, and i ordered him to flee with me into the brush just east of our campsite. the area we fled to was in a gully that runs on the east edge of the plateau where our camp is located. my intent was to take cover in the darkness away from the brilliantly illuminated (by the roaring campfire) campsite. 
 
however, it did not take long to realize that there was no sound, and the lights, a "v"-shaped assemblage of five quite bright white (w/slight yellowish tint) lights appeared to be affixed to a triangular-shaped aircraft that was flying directly towards us. the point of the "v" was oriented in the direction the object was flying. the object traveled at an unknown height from west to east, to a point approximately 75 degrees above the west horizon (nearly overhead, but not quite). my son and i hunkered down in the brush, quite amazed at what we were seeing (and not hearing!). the object banked slowly left (north) and angled in a direction generally toward the distant city of nuevo laredo. at its closest approach the object stretched approximately 10-12 degrees in maximum width. the object then began banking slowly toward the northwest horizon and it soon disappeared from sight. it is noteworthy that the object was more difficult to see (dimmer)after its closest approach to our camp. the lights appeared to be blocked somewhat by the object itself after it began to fly away from our location. 

my son and i soon returned back to our campsite, where our vehicle was parked a few yards from the campfire. we discussed what we had seen for a while, quite mystified. however, necessary chores still needed to be performed, so we attended those duties, including preparing supper and generally organizing our camp.

we kept a close eye on the sky, and i made a note that the skies were clear and very dark and transparent, and stars were clearly visible all the way down to the horizon. the m13 globular star cluster in hercules was easily visible to the unaided eye, and the m51 "whirpool" galaxy in ursa major was easily visible in 10x50 binoculars. i also noted that the omega centauri (globular) star cluster, low above the southern horizon, was very bright to the unaided eye and partially resolved into stars with the 10x50s. i also noted that during the evening hours my son and i observed (and heard) numerous high-flying large jets traversing the sky in a north to south direction several miles west of our campsite. this is along a well traveled route used by airliners and large freight jets. these fly at about 30,000 feet during their long journeys to southern destinations. additional notes indicate that it was a quite cool night away from the campfire, necessitating the use of light jackets. i noted that my son, jeremy, finally went to sleep in the truck at about 11:10 p.M. and i followed at about midnight.

my son was so impressed by the object we had seen that the following day while still at the ranch he made a sketch of it. however, his sketch shows a triangular-shaped object with 7-9 lights on its leading edge, whereas the actual object we saw had five lights, with one at the apex of the forward "point," and two lights on the leading edge of each rearward trending "edge." 

we have spoken about the sighting of the strange object many times in the intervening years, but the memory of the event is still quite vivid in my mind. it is enhanced by the fact that notes about the incident were incorporated into my archaeological field journal at the time (expedition #687). 

i have been interested in astronomy since 1974, and have watched the sky regularly since then. i am quite familiar with the various objects in the sky, both natural and man-made. i am also familiar with most types of conventional aircraft, and this was most certainly not one of those. i am certain that it was a single craft, but don't know its origin, obviously. i would be inclined to believe that it may have been a high-tech experimental aircraft, but what troubles me is why such a craft would be operating over this remote and not very extraordinary part of tamaulipas, mexico. there is nothing of a strategic nature anywhere in the region, save the u.S./mexico border itself.
content.summary: Triangular craft with lights approached silently from the west and banked north then flew away.

content.detailedDescription: the flaming mass. it was just by chance that i was at the right spot to get a view of it. i had just walked out the back door of the house and when i looked up, there it was. at first i could not figure out what it was. then after i watched it for several seconds it became more obvious to me. it came from the southwest. way up high to the west in the night sky. moving northeast and inland from over the gulf of mexico. it was obvious to me that the thing was very large and very high up in the atmosphere.The object was on fire and it appeared to me that chunks of the object where breaking off and followed by tongues of flame they fell away behind. the pace of the object across the sky and flames coming off it gave the obvious impression of a very large object entering earths atmosphere. the object proceeded north easterly and in a couple of minutes was gone from view, pine trees having blocked the view of the objects progress. i turned to go back in the house. 'that' i thought, 'was highly unusual'
content.summary: i walked out the back door and there it was, way up high to the west

content.detailedDescription: Myself(douglas walker)and my girlfriend jessica were standing out back on my porch.I was looking up when i observed a bright orange light heading sw to nw.I told jess to look up at the strange light and she said thats kind of weird.Then i went down into the yard and it was still there.She really wasnt going to think twice and disregard my lights i see.I said to her its still here and she came down and was like what is that.Definitely weird.She actually did a small drawing of what she described as triangular in shape with a core starlight in the center.She actually had a better view as she has better vision than i.I myself only made out a bright orange starlight at close distance movin slow and steady  which dimmed and then disappeared in the distance.She seen a tringle shaped craft.With a star oike core emmitting a bright orange light.I did call a neighbor and they went out and looked but it dimmed once it got over there home.
content.summary: Bright orange light with a trianglular shape star like qualities.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to smoke, since the red sox were losing. i looked towards the north east and saw movement, a group of lights, shadows almost, moving at a high rate of speed. i am a sky watcher, always have been, and have never seen anything like this. i first thought it was a plane moving away from me, but the arc of movement seemed goofy. it was a triangle shaped group of lights, the boarder was brighter then the middle. it seemed to be moving in a sweeping motion, and moving fast. i havent seen anything like this flying around fort hood in ten months. it was like watching wonder womans plane flying. i gotta tell ya, this made me feel really goofy. again, i have never seen anything like this. i was going to call me wife out to look, but it was moving to fast, then it began to fade, then it was gone. a chopper with a very bright blood red light came from the south within seconds of this thing fading. the chopper didnt seem to be in a hurry, but the bright blood red light seemed goofy, i dont recall seeing anything like that either. it kinda made my skin crawl really...  the object was there and gone within 15 seconds, it just faded out of view.
content.summary: Shadowish lights moving east to north to west, heading to fort hood

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back patio having a smoke and was looking up at the stars when a sphere shaped, framed, not solid object went right over my head, across the yard and disappeared over the treeline behind my property after being visible for approx 100 yds. it was traveling slow enough for me to follow it and absorb the details etc. pls find listed below various details as to what i saw:

1) it looked like the toy that is constructed of 6 inch plastic rods that opens and collapses. the object was a frame and not solid.It was the size of a basketball , maybe a bit larger.

2) it displayed vivid colors that i have never witnessed ie hi glow orange, blue, violet, yellow, red. the lites were constantly changing positions. they were neon like but 100x more vivid.

3) it made no sound nor did it leave a trail of smoke or lite.

4) it moved to quickly to be a balloon. it was not a gas powered plane, helicopter or remote type device nor was it fireworks.

5) it was elaborate and sophisticated. 

6) after i saw it, i thought to myself i just saw my 1st ufo. it was thrilling because i don't believe what i saw was manmade. i immediately thought it was some type of probe but not military or police/govt agencies. i was certain it was from another world.
content.summary: Multi colored basketball sized sphere crossed overhead at approx 100 mph/100-150ft.

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were in our hometown of red bluff, ca, for the annual rodeo each year, on april 17, 2010, and we had just finished eating dinner at our friend b's house.  around 9:30 pm we decided to go into town for the festivities, and since there were more than a handful of us, a few of us had to jump in the back of my buddy t's truck.  we were all laying down in the bed of the truck so that we wouldn't be pulled over.  it was myself, "k", "b", and b's brother "c", who were in the back of the truck.  

as we drove along, we were all talking loud, looking around at different things as we whizzed along wilcox rd, when suddenly i hear "k" yell out, "hey, i see a f---ing ufo!!" and i was like, "what? you're kidding," and i look up into the middle of the sky directly overhead and see this strange shape that at first reminded me of an angular cloud, in a kind of boomerang shape, but a cloud that was moving, and moving quite briskly.  it immediately clicked in my mind that this was not a natural object or a natural cloud.  it moved in a fashion that is impossible for a cloud, and there was not a natural cloud in the nightsky, it was completely clear out.  as my disbelief turned to awe i continued to stare at the object as it glided over our position in complete silence, and i saw that within the cloudy substance that flowed from the front of the object to the rear, was a geometric boomerang shaped object, with sharp lines, as if drawn by a ruler, contrasting against the background.  the cloudy mist-like substance seemed to spring forth out of nothing from the front of the object, and trailed over the rest of the craft towards the rear.  and as we gazed on in amazement for what was probably at most, 10 seconds, it approached the tree filled horizon, and that coupled with our turn on the road, took it out of our view.    

we could not believe our eyes, and started cursing a myriad of profanities uttering our complete amazement at what the hell just happened, and what the hell we just saw.  "b" and "c" had looked up a bit later than "k" and i, and had failed to see the geometric boomerang shape within the cloudy substance, but they did see the cloudy mist, in an angular fashion, gliding across the sky in a straight line briskly.  it had absolutely no sound at all, no lights, and moved in a completely straight line, in a direction that i believe was north or northeast.  we have no idea how big it was, only that it looked extremely large.  when talking about it with "k" later he told me that he held his hand up to the sky afterwards, with his pinky finger and index finger extended outwards, the others tucked in, in a sort of devil's horn you might say, and he felt like the distance between the two fingers pointing outwards was a good approximation of the wingspan of the strange object in the sky.  this however, really does not solve the qustion of just how big it really was, rather it only makes the argument for it being rather large.  if it was close to us in the sky, it was still huge as all hell, and if it was even higher up in the sky, then its size is even larger, almost mind boggling large. 

this story is written with all honesty and complete truth.  both "k" and i had always believed in the possibility of ufos, but had never seen or experienced anything like this in our lives.  after talking about it more and more, we both feel like this is an event that has changed our lives forever.  to us there is no question about it: this was a real ufo, and it was not of this earth.  there is absolutely nothing manmade out there, not the stealth bomber, or anything, that can match up to what we saw that night.  immediately the following day after seeing the object, i began to research online what sightings of ufos were out there that met the same description, and i came upon a sighting of a ufo seen over belville, texas, in september of 2009, case number 19343.  the article describing the ufo fit our description perfectly in almost every detail.  the way it was described to be moving, that at first it seemed to be a fast moving cloud, but not a cloud at all, the way it looked, and the way it glided across the sky in a straight line.  after reading this i knew that this was the exact same craft we saw, and that we were not alone in witnessing such a spectacular object. 

i will forever be changed by this.  let people judge me how they may, but i speak the truth.  this is what i saw, and i was not alone in seeing it.  something is out there.
content.summary: My friend and i saw a large, boomerang shaped object, with a cloud-like substance flowing over the object from the front to the back of the craft. it was silent, moved in a straight line, with no lights on the object at all.

content.detailedDescription:
I began checking the site from the backkporch at 8:30pm. no sighting, but when i checked again at 8:45pm, the triangle was in, in the same place, only it seemed brighter and closer. it was harder to see because the next door neighbor, who had accompanied me the night before, had all his exterior lights on, unusually, so perhaps he was 'spooked'. i checked again at 9:00pm, it was still there, but at 9:15, it was gone. it didn't move at all during the viewings. as it keeps appearing in the same place, i am wondering if it isn't something orbiting. i will keep checking each evening.
during the sighting i felt calm but surprised it was there again. this morning, again, i felt exhausted, and kept misdialing phone numbers at work. i feel as if my thinking is slightly impaired. my body still feels heavy and exhausted.
i am aware of no missing time.
content.summary: For the third time, i saw the triangle from my back porch in the same location only closer, as it was larger this time.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my parents were watching tv when we spotted a bright white light coming from a field located a few hundred feet away. the view is obstructed by the woods but you could still see the white light that's how bright it was. the light then appeared to start to rise up from the ground until it reached about tree level and then started to move towards our house. at that point we went outside onto our deck and watched the craft move towards us. the noise was unlike ive ever heard from any type of aircraft before and ive heard a lot seeing we live underneath a major airline route used nonstop. the craft moved very slowly at about tree level over our house and we were able to make out all the lights underneath. it had  round white lights on each point of the triangle and 3 smaller rectangular lights that fit between the the round lights on the edge of the craft. the craft passed over head very slowly and very quietly for about 1-2 minutes at which point we could make out that there was an arm extending from the middle of the craft that had a pulsating red/white light. the craft proceeded to move past our house at which point it suddenly took off at an extremely fast rate. i did some research online and found out that there was a sighting in the dominican republic the day before in which they had video of the same craft i had seen the next day over my house.
content.summary: Low flying v shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, april 19th, 2010
at 8:00pm, i reeturned to the back porch to look for the triangle seen for the first time on april 15th. it wasn't there, but when i returned at 8:45pm, it was there, in nearly the same position only lower. i was using a tree branch and telephone line as cross points to verify location. i was surprised and decided that this time i would take action so i asked my 19 year-old neighbor to come into the yard and look into the sky. i asked him what he saw and he said: "a triangle." we then looked with his binoculars and were shocked to see jumping red, green, and yellow lights, but no triangular shape. we looked at other bright objects in the sky, but saw no such flickering lights.
he said: "let's go chase it," so we jumped into his truck and drove sw out of town to a rural area with fewer lights. we located the triangle which was sw of the moon. we both agreed that the triangular object was further away than when we looked at it from my porch and alley. after watching it for ten minutes, we returned home. the young man was confused about it. we discussed possibilities such as satellites or other orbiting objecs, but what got us was that it was stationary for some time and then moved, not across the sky from side to side, but seemed to be retreating away from us as we observed it becoming smaller.
upon returning home i looked for it from the usual spot on the porch, but there was no sight of it. i felt wide awake and stimualted, as i had not expected to see the triangle again. if i see it again tonight, then i will suspect that it is an orbital object. i am not convinced that it is extraterrestrial. i am not upset or excited, but remain curious and would like an explanation of what this object might be.
content.summary: Second viewing of diamond shaped object in horizon located in same place as previous viewing. asked a neighbor to look at it and we drove out of town to get a better look. through his binoculars, we saw red, green and yellow lights.

content.detailedDescription:
a ���������letter to the editor��������� in the aiken, sc local newspaper of monday april 19, 2010 was entitled ���������unusual sighting in evening sky���������.

     here is most of the text of the letter:

     ���������on tuesday, april 13, my wife and i were sitting outside on our patio. we normally sit out from late dusk until it is well dark.  we watch the stars and an occasional airplane that flies over. however, that night was different.
     ���������about 8:30 i noticed an object directly overhead. for a second, i thought it was a low-flying plane. we quickly realized it was not a plane. this object was shaped like a triangle and had three white lights, one on each point of the triangle. it passed over us making no noise. i called for my teenage son to come out, and all of us stood in awe for the 30 to 45 seconds it took to fade away. it also made a few quick turns before continuing on its original east-to-west direction.
     ���������i have witnessed some strange events in my life but never like this. . . .���������

     the ���������aiken standard��������� newspaper publishes 2 or 3 letters a day on average. the first initial and last name on this letter did not stand out to me as either a frequent letter writer or otherwise noteworthy. using msn white pages, my best guess of the viewers��������� location would be on the east side of aiken, about a half mile southwest of the intersection of highways 302 and us-78.

     the aiken municipal airport is located some 7 miles north of that location. 

     this is the first eyewitness account of something unexplainable published in this newspaper in at least 2 years.

     one explanation of these delta craft: http://www.Thestealthblimp.Com/  check out the patents from the early 1990���������s ��������� they are for radar platforms that are to remain aloft for weeks or months at a time.

     i did not witness any craft on april 13, 2010. i am reporting this ���������letter to the editor��������� from yesterday���������s local newspaper.

     i have added this report to my sometime blog about more interesting reports at     [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Silent triangle with 3 white lights makes a few quick turns while flying west

content.detailedDescription:
Relato en espa���ol:

estaba caminando en direccion a la cocina , y caliento mi comida y me sirvo mi tasa de te , y al salir en direccion a mi otra casa veo el cielo 2 luces jugando entre si formando circunferencias entre si como si se abrazaran y se alejaran luego cuando las vi , llame rapidamente a mi hermana y luego a mi madre , solo llegando mi hermana mire la hora y eran las 8: 05 minutos y en esos momentos uno de ellos el mas peque���o subio y dejando a la otra abajo , y se alejaron un buen resto quedando separadas como un / pero al revez , luego de eso vi un resplandor a la derecha , y estube mucho tiempo y se quedaron ayi como si de estrellas se tratase , luego me fui a dormir por que me canse de esperar ya que no se movieron jamas.


vercion ingles:

i was walking in the direction of the kitchen and heat up my food and i use my cup of tea, and out toward my other house lights see the sky 2 play each other, forming circles to each other as if they held and when then stay away i saw them, quickly call my sister and then my mother, my sister look just getting the time and were the 8: 05 minutes and at that time one of them the youngest went up and leaving the other down, and left a good rest as being separate / but upside down, after that i saw a glow on the right, and i was a long time and they were stars ayi as if it were, then i went to sleep because i got tired of waiting and not never moved.
content.summary: Ovnis en el cielo
